ComicInfo.Title: If This Be Justice
ComicInfo.Summary: This issue contains two reprints and one original story. The first story "The Coming of Ka-Zar!" is a reprint from Amazing Spider-Man #57 and features Spider-Man & Ka-Zar. The second story "If This Be Justice...!" is a reprint from Daredevil #14 and features Daredevil with Ka-Zar as a supporting character. The third story entitled "...in the Den of the Dazzler!" is an original tale that features Angel it continued from Ka-Zar #1 and continues into Marvel Tales #30.
